Holiday notice: EUR SEPA payments paused for Labour Day
Bitstamp's EUR SEPA payments will be paused on May 1 2024 for the upcoming EU Labour Day holiday.

Due to the upcoming EU public holiday, Bitstamp's EUR SEPA payment clearing system will be unavailable on Wednesday 1 May 2024.

USD and GBP (FPS) deposits and withdrawals, credit card payments, and Google Pay, Apple Pay and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

All EUR SEPA deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day â€” May 2, 2024.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish our EU customers a happy Labour Day!
